Actions.Name: Oath Sword
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage and slashes on hit if the [name] is bloodied.

Actions.Name: Strike
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is Slashed. Slashed foes take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Stinger
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 2 spaces in a straight line, then deals 3 damage, twice, to an adjacent foe. This action can only be taken if there are no foes adjacent.

Actions.Name: Great Stride
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes up to 6 spaces in a straight line, phasing through characters. Foes they pass through take 2 damage, and are then shoved 1 to either side, and the [name] gains 2 vigor per foe passed through.
